problem: (2017•营口)如图,已知矩形纸片的一条边经过一个含30°角的直角三角尺的直角顶点,若矩形纸片的一组对边分别与直角三角尺的两边相交,∠2=115°,则∠1的度数是()
problem_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that one side of a rectangular piece of paper passes through a right-angled vertex of a right triangle with N_1 angles. If a set of opposite sides of the rectangular piece of paper intersect the two sides of the right triangle, ∠2 = N_2, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
